name: Cooking World Yummy Food
description:
Cooking World is a cooking game that focus on simulate the fun of time management and cooking technique!

Explore the classical global cuisines here! In Cooking World, you will be able to bring the best dishes all around the world to the table step by step.

Soft and fluffy donuts, crispy chocolate brownie with fudge centre, delicate waffle with beautiful art, as well as other distinctive desserts, dishes, tea... are all in Cooking World!


Features:
CLASSIC CUISINE! We provide thousands of tranditional cuisines all around the world.
FUN! Endless fun meets with challenging time management.
REAl! Experience the life of star chef by serving different customers all over the world.
PROGRESS! Upgrade kitchen appliances and ingredients to manage your restaurant.
FRESH! Create tasty cuisine with a wide choice of delicious ingredients.
FREE! Unlock restaurants and collect rare furnitures to decorate your own house as you wish.

Live your legend in Cooking World.
Put on the representative chef hat,
Hold on the magical spatula in your hand,
Show the world a legendary cuisine!
